item.title: Maureen add a quote by Krzysztof Kieslowski
item.description: "We all steal, but if we're smart we steal from great directors. Then, we can call it influence." -- Krzysztof Kieslowski

item.title: Maureen add a quote by Peter Greenaway
item.description: "I have often thought it was very arrogant to suppose you could make a film for anybody but yourself." -- Peter Greenaway

item.title: Maureen add a quote by Jean-Luc Godard
item.description: "All you need to make a movie is a girl and a gun." -- Jean-Luc Godard

item.title: Maureen add a quote by Martin Scorsese
item.description: "Cinema is a matter of what's in the frame and what's out" -- Martin Scorsese

item.title: Maureen add a quote by Ingmar Bergman
item.description: "Film as dream, film as music. No art passes our conscience in the way film does, and goes directly to our feelings, deep down into the dark rooms of our souls." -- Ingmar Bergman

item.title: Maureen add a quote by Aimee Bender
item.description: "I want to be violated by insight." -- Aimee Bender

item.title: Maureen add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel
